title: # 317 - Wheeler Walker Jr. & ME
description:
I sit down with Wheeler Walker Jr. to talk about touring with Kid Rock, Wheelers new album, finding your voice, and Wheeler sings his new song "Fuck you with the lights on" from his new album WWIII that comes out Friday Nov 30th on iTunes.

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron. Get your first 3 meals free at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by 23andme. Go to www.23andme.com/bertcast and get 30% off any DNA kit.  

This episode is also brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Enter code "Bertcast" in the search bar and get 74% off the Omaha Steaks Family Gift Package at www.omahasteaks.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Tipsy Elves. Get 20% off your order by using code "Bertcast" at checkout. Get your ugly Christmas sweaters at www.tipsyelves.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Legacy Box. Get started preserving your past today and save 40% off your first order by going to www.legacybox.com/bertcast 

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
